channel.title: July on CodeWithStu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in July on CodeWithStu's Blog

item.title: Utf8Json Media Formatters for ASP.Net Core
item.description: Recently, I have been looking at the Utf8Json project and evaluating for use in our high performance payments API. Looking at the benchmarks on the Github page, and running my own benchmarks, the numbers stated seemed to tally up, so I built a few media formatters for aspnet core.
